page.title: 20EDUCATION
page.content: {CONTRIBUTING SCHOOLS. 3 schools have been involved in compiling the information for the Domesday Survey - Blaengwawr Comprehensive,Blaengwawr Primary and Ysgol Gynradd Gymraeg,Aberdar (Welsh Primary school). Blaengwawr Comprehensive is an 11-18 co-educational school and co-ordinated the project.The school also has a Partially-hearing Unit which took part in the surveys. Blaengwawr primary is a 5-11 co-ed. school and the contributors here were mainly the Standard 4 junior class. Ysgol Gynradd Gymraeg is also a 5-11 school and again the main contributor was Dosbarth 4. Everyone who participated benefitted a great deal from the exercise (both physical and mental).
